gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 107, Cavaliers 98
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeated the Cavaliers, 107-98. Donte DiVincenzo led the way for the Knicks with 28 points (6-14 3PT FG), while Josh Hart added 13 points, a career-high tying 19 rebounds, and 10 assists in the victory, his 3rd triple-double of the season and 3rd of his career. Sam Merrill tallied 21 points (7-13 3PT FG) for the Cavaliers in the losing effort. The Knicks improve to 36-25 on the season, while the Cavaliers fall to 39-21.
